Content.En: This time, the parent planet has chosen you as the sentinel explorer
Content.Cn: 这一次母星选择你成为前哨探查者

Content.En: I hope you can understand the people on Earth
Content.Cn: 是希望你能够了解地球上的人们

Content.En: Understand their lifestyle habits and explore their secrets
Content.Cn: 了解他们的生活习惯和探索他们的秘密

Content.En: But you only have one day
Content.Cn: 但是你只有一天的时间

Content.En: Because this is just an internship, please perform well
Content.Cn: 因为这次只是实习，所以好好表现

Content.En: On this day, you need to complete the exploration tasks received on your phone
Content.Cn: 在这一天中，你需要完成手机上接收到的探寻任务

Content.En: At first, the task reply options on our phones were all hidden
Content.Cn: 一开始我们手机里面的任务回复选项是全部隐藏的

Content.En: You need to obtain information through conversations with others
Content.Cn: 需要你通过和他人对话，获得信息

Content.En: And some related information can unlock reply options
Content.Cn: 而相关的一些信息，能够解锁回复选项

Content.En: Different options have different scores, try your best to reply to everyone's task
Content.Cn: 不同的选项有不同的得分，尽力回复所有人的任务
